mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question (description, type_id, choose_a, choose_b, choose_c, choose_d, answer, status, gmt_created, gmt_modified) VALUES (#{content},${type},#{chooseA},#{chooseB},#{chooseC},#{chooseD},${answer},0,NOW(),NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE question SET description = #{question.description},type_id = ${question.typeId},choose_a = #{question.chooseA}, choose_b = #{question.chooseB},choose_c = #{question.chooseC},choose_d = #{question.chooseD}, answer = ${question.answer},gmt_created = NOW(),gmt_modified = NOW() WHERE id = ${question.id}
mapper.select: SELECT q.id AS id ,q.description AS description ,q.type_id AS typeId ,qt.name AS type ,q.choose_a AS chooseA ,q.choose_b AS chooseB ,q.choose_c AS chooseC ,q.choose_d AS chooseD ,q.answer AS answer ,q.status AS status ,q.gmt_created AS gmtCreated ,q.gmt_modified AS gmtModified FROM question as q,question_type as qt WHERE q.id != -1 AND q.type_id = qt.id LIMIT ${pno},${pagesize}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM question WHERE id != -1

SELECT * FROM question AS q1 JOIN ( SELECT ROUND( RAND() * ( (SELECT MAX(id) FROM question WHERE type_id = ${type}) - (SELECT MIN(id) FROM question WHERE type_id = ${type}) ) + (SELECT MIN(id) FROM question WHERE type_id = ${type}) ) AS qid ) AS q2 WHERE q1.id >= q2.qid ORDER BY q1.id LIMIT 1
